vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀρρενο-κοίτης, ου, ὁ,
sodomite, [Refs]; (ἀρσενοκοίτης) [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: one engaging in homosexual acts (likely referring to the active male partner), sexual deviant
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
one engaging in homosexual acts (likely referring to the active male partner), sexual deviant
a male engaging in same-gender sexual activity, a sodomite, pedarest, 1Cor. 6:9; 1Tim. 1:10*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 好男色者 (林前 6:9; 提前 1:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 好男色者 (林前 6:9; 提前 1:10)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: kẻ đồng dâm nam; kẻ đắm nam sắc ; kẻ đồng tính luyến ái
